Detailed Description

Any-dimension Bezier curve.

This class implements a n-dimension Bezier curve. The curve and tangent can be evaluated at any point, and the curve can be adaptively subdivided until the curve error is less than a maximum error factor. The members in this class are: the control points, the number of segments in the curve, the curve's dimension and the curve's pivot position. Some of its methods include: adding a control point to the curve, evaluate the curve and the tangent at a given point, loading a .bez file which contains data about a curve, adaptive subdivision of the curve, and much more.
